Understanding Web Scraping

Posted on 2025-01-18

Introduction

Web scraping is the process of extracting data from websites.

Common Uses

  • Data mining
  • Market research
  • Content aggregation

Best Practices

When scraping websites, consider these guidelines:

  1. Respect robots.txt
  2. Implement rate limiting
  3. Handle errors gracefully

Always be mindful of the website's terms of service and robots.txt file.
